metadata.title: Eyebrow Tattoo Pen Waterproof Microblading Eyebrow Pencil with Micro-Fork Tip Brow Tint Tattoo Eyes Makeup Natural Hair-Like Defined Brows All Day (Black)
features: Natural Looking Defined Eyebrows-This tattoo eyebrow pen creates very natural looking and defined brows that beautifully frame your face to compliment all makeup looks
Specially Designed Fork Tip-With four micro-forks,creates hair-like strokes with ease,so that your eyebrows will look thicker and fuller, more polished and defined
Waterproof, Smudge-Proof All Day-The long-lasting formula ensures that your makeup will last all day without smudging or fading through sweat, rain, and even water sports
Easy to Use - Beginners and professionals love our tattoo pen because it is so easy to draw and fill using the four tip design.
Money Back Guarantee - For any reason you are not satisfied with our product, please let us know and weâ€™ll instantly refund 100% of your money! No questions asked, and no returns necessary.
description: Our tattoo eyebrow pen utilizes an innovative four tips design that glides smoothly to create the most natural-looking and polished eyebrows. The intense color payoff and waterproof formula ensure that your eyebrows remain gorgeous all day long. You can count on this tattoo eyebrow pen to draw beautiful daytime to nighttime looks for every occasion.
Your eyebrows will look fuller, more polished and defined.
No smudging No fading Easy to apply Easy to remove Waterproof Long Lasting Natural Looking
1.Keep the cap tight and store it upright to prevent dry. 2.When in use, upside down and let the tip receive liquid.
